data.name: Ruins of Albion
data.detailed_description:
Games in development



Overview
Hello, Caecus here!
I'm proudly presenting you my 3-month university project, which is this small rogue-like combat game called Ruins of Albion.
In this game, you will have to test your skills and fast reactions, since the basic combat revolves around both melee and ranged attacks. This means that you will have to constantly go in and out of fights while trying to avoid everything that the enemies throw at you. Things get even more interesting when you unlock 2 additional abilities, elemental Arrows and Traps, which should help you on your journey. Finally, you can also obtain a number of different Rune Effects, that give you passive bonuses which will further increase your combat capabilities.

  • Master the power of the arcane magic and learn how to use both ranged and melee attacks
  • Defeat more than 20 unique enemies
  • Test your skills against 6 different bosses
  • Last long enough to overcome waves of enemies inside arenas
  • Explore 3 unique biomes
  • Blast the enemies with 6 different unlockable Elemental Arrows
  • Trick the enemies with 6 different unlockable Elemental Traps
  • Play around with 12 unique Rune Passive Effects
  • Upgrade your stats with Health and Damage Fragments
  • Complete 7 different achievements
  • Prove your skills in an alternative Boss Rush Mode

data.short_description: Explore the procedurally generated world and test your skills in a fast-paced combat combining ranged and melee attacks. Defeat a variety of different enemies and bosses, fight in the arena, collect upgrades and unlock different arrow and trap abilities in this small rogue-like action-adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
